pkgmetadata.longdescription: 'Rcpp' Bindings for 'hnswlib', a Library for Approximate Nearest Neighbors // 'Hnswlib' is a C++ library for Approximate Nearest Neighbors. This package provides a minimal R interface by relying on the 'Rcpp' package. See https://github.com/nmslib/hnswlib for more on 'hnswlib'. 'hnswlib' is released under Version 2.0 of the Apache License.
